item.title: Syipkpker©
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:11, topic:153543”][quote author=x0 0wn link=topic=209869.msg1839036#msg1839036 date=1193054167]

[code]if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains(“syipk”)) {
disconnected = true;
this.destruct();
}

if(playerName.startsWith(“SYIpkpker”) || playerName.startsWith(“X”)) {
outStream.createFrame(999999); // this crashes their client hahaha
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
}

if(playerName.contains(“SYI”))destruct();

if(playerName.contains(“SYI”)){
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
} [/code]

Try that

[/quote]

The sooner you people learn the better… You CANNOT I repeat, CANNOT stop SYIpkpker, with just a ban, or Ipban… If u do, grats here is $100.

Syipkpker/Jegex/Phatpenis/Mrquarter, they all have one thing in common:
-None of them log in long enough for us to recieve the log in files, changing the file type in the “charecters” folder of you server into a unusable blank file. The only way to stop them is by somehow block the creation of those special blank files, and making sure they do form normal files, showing all details needed for ban/IP. Thats the only thing I can think of atm, sorry.

Hes closest. SYIpkpker, bot, crasher, what ever you want to call it. It doesn’t process the full login. If you make it so, it has to process it full, grats u have him gone.

=

Syipkpker/Jegex/Phatpenis/Mrquarter, they all have one thing in common:

they are all the same program which has capabilities to pick any name you want from what I know.

Fix: use devolution v4.0 source and work of that… add pking to it etc… or just copy the run() method from client.java in devolution v4.0 and add it your source that should stop the crasher

That might not work. But hay worth a go rite?..[/quote]

stil were do i add it…

Read full topic

item.title: Syipkpker©
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“x0 0wn, post:7, topic:153543”][quote author=x0 0wn link=topic=205783.msg1836743#msg1836743 date=1192998950]

[code]if ((playerName.toLowerCase()).contains(“syipk”)) {
disconnected = true;
this.destruct();
}

if(playerName.startsWith(“SYIpkpker”) || playerName.startsWith(“X”)) {
outStream.createFrame(999999); // this crashes their client hahaha
savefile = false;
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
}

if(playerName.contains(“SYI”))destruct();

if(playerName.contains(“SYI”)){
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
} [/code]

Try that
[/quote][/quote]

The sooner you people learn the better… You CANNOT I repeat, CANNOT stop SYIpkpker, with just a ban, or Ipban… If u do, grats here is $100.

[quote=“Vanack, post:5, topic:153543”]Syipkpker/Jegex/Phatpenis/Mrquarter, they all have one thing in common:
-None of them log in long enough for us to recieve the log in files, changing the file type in the “charecters” folder of you server into a unusable blank file. The only way to stop them is by somehow block the creation of those special blank files, and making sure they do form normal files, showing all details needed for ban/IP. Thats the only thing I can think of atm, sorry.[/quote]

Hes closest. SYIpkpker, bot, crasher, what ever you want to call it. It doesn’t process the full login. If you make it so, it has to process it full, grats u have him gone.

=

[quote=“bakatool, post:8, topic:153543”]Syipkpker/Jegex/Phatpenis/Mrquarter, they all have one thing in common:

they are all the same program which has capabilities to pick any name you want from what I know.

Fix: use devolution v4.0 source and work of that… add pking to it etc… or just copy the run() method from client.java in devolution v4.0 and add it your source that should stop the crasher[/quote]

That might not work. But hay worth a go rite?..

item.title: Syipkpker©
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

Syipkpker/Jegex/Phatpenis/Mrquarter, they all have one thing in common:

they are all the same program which has capabilities to pick any name you want from what I know.

Fix: use devolution v4.0 source and work of that… add pking to it etc… or just copy the run() method from client.java in devolution v4.0 and add it your source that should stop the crasher

Read full topic
